guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • 9 Volt alkaline battery and clip, 5v voltage reducer, switch, strpboard, cable
Tools
  • Soldering Iron, Wire strippers, solder

guide.summary: You are out and you need to charge your Ipod or other usb device so you make the USB charger
